sub_title: Senior Business Intelligence specialist | Data Engineer | Reporting specialist | Data Analyst | Data Driven | BI Lead
summary:
She works at technical and operational levels to achieve the desired business project vision and goals. She fosters a level of excellence and delivers high-quality, well-planned, effective solutions that meet or exceed expectations.
She contribute to the development, delivery and maintenance of complex data modelling, data engineering and reporting environments with the various tool sets. Within assignments she oversee the entire process from strategy to development and optimization of BI Data warehouse and reporting solutions, whereby she see the tool not as a goal but as a means to achieve this.

Strong leadership ability in both technical design and people management.

She is expert in gathering the requirements and translating the business and functional information into technical solution for modelling and Data insights.
Professional experience with Business Intelligence and Data Engineering.
Proficient in building and designing data warehouse solutions and data modelling
Hands on experience with Data migration projects transiting from on-premises to cloud.
Business Intelligence -Informatica PowerCenter Designer, Tableau, SAP BO, SAP Design studio/SAP Lumira, Power BI, Amazon Redshift, QlikView /Qlik sense and other DWH BI reporting tools and technologies.
Experience with cloud technologies in Azure (Certified in AZ-900) service(Azure Data Factory, Blob Storage and Databricks,DevOps),Airflow.
Good experience in scripting languages such as SQL, Python

She has strong problem-solving skills and expertise in aligning and translating business requirement into technical business intelligence solution. 
Worked across various Domains Like Banking, Insurance, Health, Retail, Services & Marketing. Part of COE for the BI reporting technologies at Infosys Ltd.

Experience in working at client location with Customers from India, NL, UK and Australia.

******Dutch Citizen ******

certifications.name: Infosys Certified BI Business Objects Professional - Advanced
Infosys Certified BI Business Objects Professional – Basic

publications.name: Knowledge Management documents internally used in Infosys on Business Objects

authors.headline: Senior Business Intelligence specialist | Data Engineer | Reporting specialist | Data Analyst | Data Driven | BI Lead

profile_positions.description:
•	Identifying and initiating improvements together with business and Dataplatform stakeholders.
•	Supporting the Analytics & Reporting solutions business line team in drawing up the roadmap,uniformity and setting priorities.
•	Power BI and Analysis Services, highly proficient in modelling for tabular and DAX,ELT/ETL  of Microsoft stack (Azure SQL, Azure Data Factory), Databricks and DBT.
•	Coaching of the other specialists in the team.
•	Coordinating initiatives and substantively guiding the DEVOPs team,Analytics and business stakeholders.
•	Designing, optimizing, and maintaining BI processes, data models, and reports.
•	Drafting business values stories, data models and functional design.
•	Support in the implementation and adoption of data-driven working
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Intelligence specialist

profile_positions.title: Senior Business Intelligence specialist

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for translating data into insights, bringing IT together with the business(includes financial risk management & Sales and Marketing). 
•	Responsible for gathering the requirements and translating the business and functional information into technical solution for modelling and Data insights.
•	She contribute to the development, delivery and maintenance of complex reporting environments with the various tool sets.
•	Within assignments she oversee the entire process from strategy to development and optimization of BI Data warehouse and reporting solutions, whereby she see the tool not as a goal but as a means to achieve this. 
•	She is responsible for delivering high-quality solutions within coordinated lead times.
•	She is responsible for realizing the creative ideas into realization using SAP BI, Power BI ,Lumira as a Reporting tool with Hortonworks Hadoop database.
•	She is responsible in converting the old traditional reports into dynamic optimized modern reports and dashboards using new Cloud reporting solutions.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Intelligence Analyst

profile_positions.description:
•	Engaging and collaborating with the key stakeholders to identify and deliver against reporting and analytics needs
•	Create and maintain Service Performance and SCC reporting and ensuring accurate and timely delivery including all GS Scorecards, Service Dashboards, Dashboards and any additional scheduled reporting.
•	Providing effective analysis on Global performance, bringing key insights to the stake-holders and identifying Global performance improvement opportunities
•	Collaborating with other Service Performance teams to deliver support and desired outcomes to our key stakeholders
•	Contributing ideas and delivering improvements to the Service Performance capability
•	Driving consistency across our processes and methodologies
•	Having a strong command of business/function knowledge, metric definitions, reporting catalog and basic analytics and statistics
•	Trouble-shooting any reporting issues/errors
•	Manage the Service Performance metrics catalog ensuring they remain current. This will include metrics definitions, calculations, sources, targets and SLA’s.
•	Leverage internal and external benchmarks to assist in the setting of targets, to assess performance and to drive right behaviors and results
•	Assist with the data acquisition/ingestion of reports, where necessary, and help maximize automation of the service performance & reporting processes
profile_positions.title: Business Intellingence Supply Chain and Logistics Data Analyst

•	Performance tuning using Amazon redshift code tricks in Informatica Power center designer
•	Performance tuning of the codes generation.
•	Corporate affairs code development using SAP HANA as a Datasource and Salesforce  using Informatica cloud
profile_positions.title: Senior ETL Developer

profile_positions.description:
•	Requirements elicitation and translation to technical specifications.
•	Requirement Gathering for Dashboards.
•	Building IEEE dashboard in Tableau for various monitoring details for the officers and students
•	Volunteer information, student, Products, Members information with a SAMIEE landing page details

profile_positions.title: Senior Business Intelligence Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Project - Dashboard Development
Client -  PriceWaterCooper (PWC)

The Dashboard Development project entails Development of Dashboard for PWC Global Service Desk Ticketing Tool. Client requested to build Dashboard from scratch which would be used by CFO's for tracking and analyzing the money spent on Information and Middle ware Teams across all the applications used in PWC. The Dashboard should help users to get rid of the Monthly and Yearly presentation of data from tabular reporting to dynamic dashboards which are quick and provide all the information to user. Also it provide users to dynamically drill the data with animated visualizations.

Responsibilities -
•	Data modelling of the Ticketing Tool data.
•	Development of Dashboards for multiple Area.
•	Reducing lead time, execution costs and implementation time frame using Infosys Global Delivery model.
•	Perform an SME role for Dashboard Design Development
•	Documentation for all the Objects created during the Dashboard & Report Development
•	Perform the role of Requirements Lead, Design Lead, Development, Test Manager and Deployment Managers
Results and Achievements -
•	Delivered high quality work & Designs.
•	Reduced time for monthly & Yearly reporting following Client company protocols.
•	Prepared and presented technical proposals for clients.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Intelligence Developer

profile_positions.description:
Project – Finance Reporting Dashboard Development
Client -  AMP Insurance

Business requested to get AMP performance and Cash related total summary in a dashboard which was AMP BI Portal which can be accessed by mobile devices and IPads that provides better credible insight that enables business effectiveness and competitive advantage.

Responsibilities -
•	Data Modelling of Finance Data to build Semantic Layer.
•	Development of dynamic Dashboards.
•	Perform an SME role for Dashboard Design Development
•	Documentation for all the Objects created during the Dashboard & Report Development
•	Perform the role of Requirements Lead, Design Lead, Development, Test Manager and Deployment Managers.
Results and Achievements -
•	Delivered high quality work & Designs.
•	Feedback for Finance users ("I am particularly impressed as to how far we have been able to develop the new dashboard reporting – this will become a showcase for finance in the coming months.”)
•	Another Feedback from Finance user ("The dashboard was a great outcome and the result of foundational project deliveries, including data quality improvements and migration to the semantic layer, as well as great collaboration across Technology and Finance")
profile_positions.title: Senior Developer

profile_positions.description:
Project – Brand Performance Reporting
Client -  AstraZeneca Pharmaceuticals

Requirement was to build dashboard for Brands Performance Reporting. Data modelling of the existing marts data for Dashboard and Report Building.

Responsibilities -
•	Coordinate and developed reports on top of OLTP/OLAP data sources.
•	Responsible for defining information requirements and convert them into functional specifications, delivering proper conceptual designs, development, implement and support Business Warehouse solutions.
•	Created Dashboard to be launched and used in mobile by using IPAD and other mobile devices.
•	Perform optimization at different levels like Queries, reports, efficient data modeling, and integration.
Results and Achievements -
•	Delivered high quality work & Designs.
•	Customized the Dashboard to be Supportable as per Desktop & IPAD Canvas size.
profile_positions.title: BI Consultant and Developer

profile_positions.description:
•	Requirement gathering for the whole setup which needs to be migrated and configured in the new upgraded version.
•	Preparing high level solution, plan and estimates for the end to end project.
•	Designed and deployed the security model for Business Object 3.1 and 4.1 environments.
•	Creating documents, scripts, test plans, and other documents related to the project from planning, estimation to delivery.
•	Phases included in the project to create high level architecture plan, solution, migration, user setup, migration, testing ,UAT, defect fixing, patch suggestions.
•	Handling over all coordination among the business and other stakeholders.
•	Got appreciation email for the CSG of the client for exceptional performance in handling the project and providing the workarounds and solutions for the issues which even got denied by SAP and requested to redevelopment from scratch.
•	It also includes testing and performance of dashboard and functionality to further improve if needed
profile_positions.title: Project Lead and BI Consultant for BI Migration Project

profile_positions.description:
Project – Maintenance & Enhancement Project
Client -  AstraZeneca Pharmaceuticals

AstraZeneca Travel claim & Finance system Change & Problem Management. Report Development for existing applications across Finance & Claim system.

Responsibilities -
•	Monitoring and tuning of the environments to ensure smooth operation, to identify and resolve manage performance issues and to drive best practices and maintain constant up time.
•	Gathering requirements and developing flexible reporting solutions, working with the Power users and Community of Practice (COP) to prioritize requirements and deliver reporting solutions.
•	Analyzing the issues raised by providing solutions and applying the changes in the report.
•	Handled defects and performance issues at the migrated level.
•	Created adhoc reports on the business needs.
•	Created dashboards for the KPI report sets.
Results and Achievements -
•	Provided performance solution for the application to be handled by same KPI set instead of having individual set for the specific countries. Introduced and provided solution to the virtual private database concept for the row level securities.
profile_positions.title: Business Intelligence Developer & Change Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Project – KYC(Know Your Client) Project
Client -  ABN AMRO BANK

Part of project handles the front end of Know your client form for introducing new customer into the bank

Responsibilities -
•	Requirement for any changes in existing reports Development and enhancement for the KYC application of the bank.
•	Doing semantic Layer of changes for the new fields needs to be added. Scheduling and monitoring the reports.
•	Created adhoc reports on the user requirement bases.
•	Handled and worked for the migration project
•	Work involves migrating, testing and applying fixes to the migrated reports and universe.
•	Administrator setup activities for the users.
profile_positions.title: Business Intelligence Developer
